description: Bresca is a Michelin-starred modern bistro in Washington, D.C., known for its innovative and artistic approach to cuisine. The menu focuses on seasonal ingredients and bold flavor combinations. The atmosphere is chic yet relaxed, making it perfect for special occasions or refined casual dining.

food_address: 1500 New Hampshire Ave NW, Washington, DC 20036
description: The Pembroke is a stylish and elegant dining room located in Dupont Circle. It serves a menu of American cuisine with European influences, presented with finesse and sophistication. The restaurant features beautiful interior design and a comfortable, upscale vibe.

1789 Restaurant & Bar is a historic gem nestled in Georgetown. It offers refined American fare in a charming setting filled with antique decor and old-world charm. The restaurant is known for its exceptional service and seasonal dishes.

Fiola is a fine Italian dining restaurant by award-winning chef Fabio Trabocchi. Located in downtown D.C., it offers sophisticated, seasonal menus featuring pasta, seafood, and elegant wine pairings. The ambiance is luxurious and ideal for upscale dining experiences.

Ambar Shaw reimagines Balkan cuisine through a small plates concept. The menu blends traditional flavors with modern culinary techniques. It’s a vibrant and stylish spot popular for its unlimited tasting menu and inventive cocktails.

food_address: 2650 Virginia Avenue The Watergate Hotel, Washington, DC 20037
description: Kingbird is located inside The Watergate Hotel and features contemporary American cuisine. With artful presentations and a sophisticated menu, the restaurant offers both all-day dining and a more upscale evening experience. It boasts a sleek, modern design with views of the Potomac River.

food_address: 867 New Jersey Ave SE, Washington, DC 20003
description: Smoke & Mirrors is a rooftop bar and restaurant with sweeping views of Washington, D.C. Known for its craft cocktails and shareable small plates, it offers a trendy ambiance ideal for evening outings. The rooftop experience makes it a hotspot for both locals and tourists.

food_address: 1515 Rhode Island Ave NW, Washington, DC 20005
description: Gerrard Street Kitchen is a globally inspired restaurant at The Darcy Hotel. It offers a curated menu that fuses Asian, Middle Eastern, and Latin American influences. The space features modern decor and a warm, inviting atmosphere.

Filomena Ristorante is a Georgetown staple serving hearty Italian-American cuisine. It’s beloved for its homemade pastas, generous portions, and old-world ambiance. Seasonal decorations and on-site pasta-making add to its unique charm.

Ben's Chili Bowl is an iconic D.C. institution known for its chili dogs and half-smokes. A cultural landmark since 1958, it has served celebrities, presidents, and locals alike. The atmosphere is casual and steeped in history.

Gallaghers Steakhouse is a legendary New York City steakhouse located near Times Square. Known for its dry-aged prime beef and classic New York charm, it has been serving quality steaks since 1927. The interior features an old-school vibe with wood-paneled walls and vintage photographs.

Da Marino is an Italian restaurant nestled in the Theater District of Manhattan. It is celebrated for its traditional recipes, warm ambiance, and live piano music. With walls adorned with photos of celebrity guests, it’s a lively spot for pre-theater dining.

IL Cortile is a family-owned Italian restaurant in the heart of Little Italy. Its extensive menu features classic Southern Italian dishes and house-made pastas. The ambiance is romantic and elegant, perfect for date nights or special occasions.

food_address: 28 Liberty St 60th floor, New York, NY 10005
description: Manhatta combines breathtaking views of Lower Manhattan with refined New American cuisine. Located on the 60th floor, it offers a serene, upscale dining experience with a focus on locally sourced ingredients. The service and scenery make it a top destination for elevated dining.

Keens Steakhouse is one of the oldest steakhouses in NYC, famous for its mutton chop and historic décor. It boasts an incredible collection of churchwarden pipes and a traditional American menu. Dining at Keens is like stepping back in time.

Peter Luger Steak House in Brooklyn has been a benchmark for quality steaks since 1887. Known for its no-frills atmosphere and cash-only policy, it serves perfectly aged porterhouse steaks. It’s a must-visit for steak lovers seeking authenticity.

food_address: 30 Hudson Yards 101st floor, New York, NY 10001
description: Peak with Priceless Restaurant & Bar is located at the summit of Hudson Yards. It features floor-to-ceiling windows and a contemporary American menu. Guests come for the views as much as the cuisine, making it ideal for a memorable outing.

food_address: First Floor, 14 Christopher St, New York, NY 10014
description: Petite Boucherie is a quaint French bistro in the West Village. It offers classic dishes like escargot, coq au vin, and steak frites in an intimate, candle-lit space. The ambiance evokes the charm of Parisian cafés.

food_address: 345 Park Ave S, New York, NY 10010
description: Upland blends California-inspired cuisine with Italian influences in a warm, rustic setting. The open kitchen and wood-accented interiors add to the cozy atmosphere. It's known for its approachable yet refined dishes like bucatini cacio e pepe and roast chicken.

food_address: 240 Central Park S, New York, NY 10019
description: Marea is a Michelin-starred restaurant near Central Park specializing in Italian seafood. Renowned for its crudo, handmade pastas, and elegant service, it's a favorite for upscale dining. The dining room is sleek and sophisticated, attracting locals and tourists alike.

By George restaurant and bar is housed in a historic Atlanta hotel, offering contemporary American fare. With its grand decor and curated cocktails, it blends Southern charm with upscale dining. The restaurant’s ambiance is both sophisticated and inviting.

Nikolai's Roof is an upscale restaurant in Atlanta atop the Hilton hotel. Known for its French-Russian cuisine and panoramic city views, it delivers an exceptional fine-dining experience. Guests appreciate the elegant setting and attentive service.

food_name: The Americano Atlanta by Scott Conant
description: The Americano Atlanta by Scott Conant is a modern Italian steakhouse from the celebrity chef. The menu features prime meats and pasta in a sleek, vibrant environment. It's a stylish spot for both casual diners and culinary enthusiasts.

food_address: 1100 West Peachtree Street NW Atlanta, GA 30309
description: Pasta da Pulcinella is a cozy trattoria located in Midtown Atlanta. It serves homemade pasta dishes in a rustic house setting, perfect for intimate dinners. The warm service and charming atmosphere make it a local favorite.

food_address: 249 Ivan Allen Jr Blvd NW, Atlanta, GA 30313
description: Atlanta Breakfast Club is a buzzing breakfast and brunch spot in downtown Atlanta. Famous for its fried chicken and waffles and creamy grits, it delivers hearty Southern comfort food. Expect a wait, as it’s a hit with both tourists and locals.

food_address: 490 East Paces Ferry Rd NE, Atlanta, GA 30305
description: Aria is a high-end dining destination in Buckhead known for its contemporary American menu. The setting is intimate and artistically designed, ideal for romantic dinners. The menu features seasonal ingredients crafted with precision.

Ray's in the City is a seafood restaurant in downtown Atlanta. It offers a wide selection of fresh seafood, steaks, and sushi in an elegant yet relaxed atmosphere. Live music and attentive service enhance the dining experience.

Poor Calvin's is a creative fusion restaurant in Atlanta combining Southern and Asian flavors. Dishes like lobster fried rice and duck confit with Thai spices stand out. The ambiance is modern with whimsical décor.

Home Grown is a laid-back Southern diner in Atlanta serving comfort food with a local twist. The quirky interior is filled with vintage finds, and the menu focuses on farm-fresh ingredients. It’s best known for its breakfast and brunch offerings.

food_address: 1460 Ellsworth Industrial Blvd NW Suite 1, Atlanta, GA 30318
description: Bacchanalia is Atlanta’s premier fine dining restaurant offering a seasonal prix-fixe menu. With locally sourced ingredients and exquisite presentations, it provides a top-tier culinary experience. The modern yet minimalist setting adds to its upscale appeal.

Sugidama is a cozy Japanese izakaya in Somerville, MA, specializing in sushi, ramen, and sake. Its warm interior and traditional decor create an authentic dining experience. Locals love the quality and value of its extensive menu.

La Brasa is a globally inspired restaurant in Somerville offering wood-fired dishes made with local ingredients. It has a rustic-industrial vibe and a diverse menu that changes with the seasons. The communal tables add to its social, lively feel.

Moona is a chic Mediterranean restaurant in Cambridge, MA. The menu showcases bold, fresh flavors from the Eastern Mediterranean with a modern twist. The space is intimate and stylish, making it ideal for both dates and small groups.

Puritan & Company is a modern American restaurant in Cambridge focused on New England ingredients. Known for its inventive menu and brunch options, the space combines rustic charm with a contemporary vibe. It’s a favorite among foodies.

Wusong Road is a tropical cocktail bar and Asian street food spot in Cambridge. It features tiki-inspired decor and offers dishes like bao buns and noodles. The upstairs lounge and unique drinks make it a nightlife favorite.

Krasi is a Greek wine bar and restaurant located in Boston’s Back Bay. It offers a curated menu of meze and authentic Greek dishes. The cozy yet upscale setting is enhanced by a large selection of rare Greek wines.

SRV (Serene Republic of Venice) is an Italian restaurant in Boston focusing on Venetian small plates and handmade pasta. Its elegant yet unpretentious setting makes it popular for both casual and celebratory meals. The pasta tasting menu is a standout.

Blue Nile is a family-run Ethiopian restaurant in Jamaica Plain. It offers a traditional injera-based menu with rich stews and vegetarian options. The welcoming atmosphere and authentic flavors keep guests returning.

Merengue Restaurant is a vibrant Dominican eatery in Roxbury, Boston. The lively ambiance and colorful decor reflect its Caribbean roots. It's known for generous portions and bold, flavorful dishes like mofongo and fried plantains.

Tonino is a charming Italian trattoria located in Jamaica Plain. It serves handmade pastas and rustic Italian fare in a quaint setting. The restaurant emphasizes quality ingredients and traditional recipes.

Irwin’s is a Sicilian-inspired rooftop restaurant in South Philadelphia. Located in a historic school building, it combines elegant Italian cuisine with city skyline views. It’s perfect for intimate dinners and special occasions.

Pat's King of Steaks is one of Philadelphia’s most iconic cheesesteak shops. Founded in 1930, it’s often credited with inventing the Philly cheesesteak. The no-frills counter service and outdoor seating attract locals and tourists alike.

Angelo's Pizzeria is a beloved South Philly pizza spot known for its wood-fired pies and house-baked hoagie rolls. It’s a cash-only operation with limited seating, so lines are common. The pizza crust and ingredients are top notch.

Friday Saturday Sunday is a modern American fine dining restaurant in Philadelphia’s Rittenhouse Square. It offers a seasonal tasting menu in an intimate, multi-level space. It’s praised for its creativity and attention to detail.

Vetri Cucina is a critically acclaimed Italian restaurant offering an elegant, prix fixe dining experience. Located in a historic townhouse, it specializes in handmade pastas and regional Italian dishes. The ambiance is warm and refined.

Kampar is a Malaysian restaurant in Philadelphia serving traditional Southeast Asian dishes. Its menu features bold curries, noodles, and street food favorites. The casual setting allows the flavors to take center stage.

South Philly Barbacoa is known for its authentic barbacoa tacos and community-oriented mission. Owned by chef Cristina Martinez, it has received national acclaim. The menu is simple, but every bite is rich in flavor and heart.

Vernick Fish is a seafood-focused restaurant in Philadelphia’s Four Seasons Hotel. It offers modern interpretations of classic seafood dishes in a refined setting. The raw bar and small plates are standout features.

Rex at the Royal is a Southern-inspired restaurant set in a historic theater. It combines Lowcountry cuisine with Philly soul in a stylish setting. Expect dishes like shrimp and grits, bourbon cocktails, and creative starters.

food_address: 932 S 10th St (at Hall St), Philadelphia, PA 19147
description: Tabachoy is a Filipino-American eatery known for its inventive takes on classic dishes. The name means “chubby” in Tagalog, reflecting its indulgent, satisfying plates. It offers casual dining with bold flavors and generous portions.

Estiatorio Milos is a luxurious Greek seafood restaurant in Miami, known for its market-fresh fish. It emphasizes simple preparation to highlight the natural flavors. The elegant ambiance and attentive service make it a top-tier dining spot.

Beauty & The Butcher is a trendy steakhouse in Miami offering inventive takes on meat-focused dishes. The décor is modern and vibrant, and the menu includes shareable plates and curated wines. It’s a perfect mix of chic and delicious.

La Mar by Gastón Acurio serves contemporary Peruvian cuisine on the waterfront in Brickell. Known for its ceviche and anticuchos, the restaurant blends upscale dining with Latin American flair. The outdoor patio offers spectacular bay views.

Dirty French Steakhouse is a flamboyant and bold eatery offering French-inspired steakhouse fare. With opulent décor and theatrical presentation, it’s a unique experience. Expect a lively atmosphere and luxurious dishes.

Old's Havana Cuban Bar & Cocina is a festive spot in Little Havana, Miami. It offers traditional Cuban dishes, cocktails, and live music in a nostalgic setting. The ambiance evokes the golden age of Havana’s nightlife.

CVI.CHE 105 is a popular Peruvian restaurant with multiple locations in Miami. Famous for its wide array of ceviches, it also features lomo saltado and causas. The vibrant interior and colorful plates create an exciting dining vibe.

food_address: Bayside Marketplace, 401 Biscayne Blvd 2nd floor, Miami, FL 33132
description: La Cañita is a Caribbean and Latin American restaurant on Miami’s waterfront. With bold flavors and tropical cocktails, it’s great for both casual and special dining. The views of the bay add a scenic touch to the experience.

Mayami Wynwood is a high-energy Latin fusion restaurant and lounge. Located in the artsy Wynwood district, it offers theatrical dining with live performances and music. The menu is bold, and the experience is unforgettable.

Sanguich De Miami is a small, artisanal Cuban sandwich shop in Little Havana. It makes everything from scratch, including the pickles and mustard. Though small in size, it’s big on flavor and authenticity.

Niu Kitchen is a hidden gem in downtown Miami offering Catalan-inspired tapas. Its minimalist decor and bold flavors make it a favorite for foodies. The dishes are inventive yet rooted in tradition, offering a true taste of Barcelona.

Haberdish is a Southern kitchen and craft cocktail bar located in Charlotte, NC. It serves fried chicken, mac and cheese, and other comfort foods in a vintage-style setting. The décor pays homage to mill town roots, and the cocktails are top-tier.

food_address: 1100 Beatties Ford Rd (at Oaklawn Ave), Charlotte, NC 28216
description: Original Chicken & Ribs is a casual dining spot in Charlotte known for its hearty, no-frills meals. It specializes in classic American BBQ and fried chicken. The portions are generous, and the service is friendly.

L'Ostrica is a seafood restaurant in Charlotte offering fresh oysters and a coastal European menu. The atmosphere is casual but elegant, with a strong focus on quality ingredients. It’s popular for happy hour and special occasions alike.

Lang Van is a beloved family-owned Vietnamese restaurant in Charlotte. It has a huge menu filled with authentic options, from pho to clay pot dishes. The warm hospitality and consistency make it a city favorite.

Salud Cerveceria is a craft beer and wood-fired pizza spot in Charlotte’s NoDa neighborhood. It offers a rotating beer selection and creative pizza flavors. The laid-back vibe and community spirit make it a neighborhood staple.

Alexander Michael's is a cozy American tavern located in Charlotte’s Fourth Ward. The menu is straightforward but satisfying, with pub favorites and daily specials. Its homey charm and consistent quality draw loyal patrons.

Stagioni is a modern Italian restaurant located in a restored historic villa. It blends classic Italian dishes with seasonal, locally sourced ingredients. The space is elegant yet inviting, making it suitable for both dates and dinners with friends.

Restaurant Constance is a tiny, reservation-only farm-to-table concept in Charlotte. It focuses on local produce and creative plating in an intimate setting. Diners enjoy the personal, handcrafted feel of each course.

food_address: 135 Levine Avenue of the Arts #100, Charlotte, NC 28202
description: Fin & Fino is an Uptown Charlotte seafood house with a modern, social vibe. Known for its oysters and seafood towers, the restaurant encourages sharing. The staff is knowledgeable and attentive, adding to the energetic ambiance.

Supperland is a Southern steakhouse located in a converted church. It fuses traditional flavors with creative twists, served in a beautifully renovated space. Guests love its theatrical dishes and upscale rustic aesthetic.

Prince's Hot Chicken is the original Nashville hot chicken joint. It’s credited with inventing the genre and still serves it spicy, crispy, and full of flavor. The setting is humble, but the legacy is unmatched.

Hattie B's Hot Chicken is a popular hot chicken chain born in Nashville. Known for its range of spice levels, from mild to “shut the cluck up,” it’s a go-to for locals and tourists. The lines are long but worth it.

The Catbird Seat is a chef-driven tasting-menu-only restaurant in Nashville. Diners sit around an open kitchen and watch their multi-course meals prepared in real time. It’s exclusive, interactive, and unforgettable.

Henrietta Red is a bright, stylish oyster bar and restaurant in Nashville’s Germantown. It offers seasonal American cuisine with a strong seafood focus. The space is airy, modern, and ideal for casual-chic dining.

Pinewood Social is a multipurpose venue with a restaurant, bar, and even bowling lanes. Located in a historic warehouse, it offers Southern-inspired dishes and brunch favorites. The concept combines dining, work, and play.

The Electric Jane is a dynamic Nashville venue combining elevated cuisine with live entertainment. It offers creative American dishes in a stylish space that transitions into nightlife. Great for groups and late-night fun.

The Farm House is a Southern restaurant in Nashville that focuses on local, seasonal fare. Its rustic yet contemporary interior matches the farm-to-fork menu. Known for brunch and hearty mains, it’s welcoming and refined.
Lockeland Table is an East Nashville neighborhood restaurant rooted in Southern hospitality. The menu combines regional ingredients with wood-fired cooking. It’s cozy, casual, and community-oriented.

Etch is a bold, globally inspired restaurant led by Chef Deb Paquette. It features daring flavor combinations and vibrant presentations in downtown Nashville. Ideal for adventurous palates seeking something beyond the usual.

Martin's Bar-B-Que Joint is a whole-hog BBQ spot with locations across Tennessee. It serves smoky meats, Southern sides, and local beer in a laid-back setting. The casual vibe is perfect for families and BBQ enthusiasts.
An upscale American tavern in a historic Club Room setting overlooking Michigan Avenue, known for its house-made charcuterie, oysters, and robust craft beer list.
A bustling, modern American tavern with hearty comfort dishes, classic cocktails, and striking industrial-chic décor steps from the Chicago Theatre.
A riverside steakhouse and rotisserie powerhouse spotlighting prime-aged beef, whole-bird chicken, and panoramic river views in a sleek, airy dining room.
Mediterranean-style small plates and an expansive wine list, with pork-centric dishes and cheeses served in a lively, communal-style dining room.
A chic Mediterranean/Middle Eastern spot offering shareable mezze, wood-fired flatbreads, and inventive cocktails in a lofty, modern space.
Chef Stephanie Izard’s flagship featuring bold, globally inspired small plates in a buzzing West Loop location with an open-kitchen vibe.

food_address: 12 S Michigan Ave, 13th Floor, Chicago, IL 60603
description: A rooftop gem atop the Chicago Athletic Association Hotel, serving seasonal American fare and craft cocktails with sweeping skyline and lake views.
A bustling Italian kitchen known for house-made pasta, inventive antipasti, and a convivial atmosphere in the heart of the West Loop.
World-class fine dining by Chef Grant Achatz, offering avant-garde, multi-sensory tasting menus in an intimate Lincoln Park townhouse.
A farm-to-table pioneer celebrating Midwestern ingredients with seasonal tasting menus and a warm, rustic dining room in Fulton Market.

food_address: 750 S Rampart Blvd, Ste 40, Las Vegas, NV 89145
description: A relaxed Summerlin Thai spot serving authentic pad Thai, curries, and noodle bowls with fresh ingredients and bold flavors.

food_address: 308 W Sahara Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89102
description: Golden Steer Steakhouse Las Vegas, located just off the Strip at 308 W. Sahara Avenue, is the city's oldest and most iconic steakhouse, serving guests since 1958. Steeped in history, the restaurant boasts a classic, old-school Vegas ambiance where legendary entertainers like Frank Sinatra and Elvis Presley once dined.

food_address: 150 Las Vegas Blvd S, The Shops at Crystals, Las Vegas, NV 89106
description: A polished Italian trattoria by Chef Tony Gemignani, featuring handmade pastas, wood-fired pizzas, and an upscale retail-district ambiance.
Classic American and seafood dishes served in a vintage-inspired dining room at the Americana Hotel, complete with warm service and old-Vegas charm.

food_address: 3950 S Las Vegas Blvd, Wynn Las Vegas, NV 89109
description: A tribute to Ol’ Blue Eyes with Italian classics, steaks, and live entertainment overlooking the Lake of Dreams at Wynn Las Vegas.

food_address: 2440 E Flamingo Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89121
description: A sleek Asian-fusion destination offering sushi, sashimi, and creative shareable plates alongside craft cocktails in an intimate setting.

food_address: 3377 S Las Vegas Blvd, The Venetian, Las Vegas, NV 89109
description: Traditional Italian-American fare in a romantic Venetian-style dining room beside the Grand Canal at The Venetian.

food_address: 3445 Las Vegas Blvd S, The Palazzo, Las Vegas, NV 89109
description: A classic steakhouse in the Venetian/Palazzo complex, best known for prime-aged steaks, fresh seafood, and Italian-inspired sides in an elegant space.

food_address: 3570 Las Vegas Blvd S, Caesars Palace, Las Vegas, NV 89109
description: Celebrity-chef Nobu Matsuhisa’s renowned Japanese-Peruvian fusion menu, served in a minimalist, upscale dining room at Caesars Palace.

food_address: 2000 S Las Vegas Blvd, Stratosphere Tower, Las Vegas, NV 89104
description: The iconic revolving restaurant atop the STRAT Tower, offering panoramic views of the Strip paired with an upscale American tasting menu.
